--Apple-Mail=_BE72BF55-2DAF-4FF0-A51E-0C8BF97DFBDB
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=windows-1252

Hi there,

For language identification, I've been using the language-detect=
or project. I'm in the middle of integrating this into Tika, which currentl=
y uses some code/data (ported from Nutch) which is less accurate/performant=
.

I've also been working on my own version (called yalder), but it's not q=
uite ready for prime time. 200 languages, about 2x faster than language-det=
ector, and 99.95% accuracy on samples of the EU parliamentary text (21 lang=
uages). But need to finish up some packaging issues.

As an aside, you'll h=
ave to decide how best to extract the main content of the page (e.g. use Bo=
ilerpipe), as accuracy will be impacted if you don't strip out some of the =
"chrome" that's in a lot of pages.

And you obviously need to remove all of=
 the HTML markup. I don't know how that's typically done w/a Heritrix-based=
 crawl; for our crawls we typically run it through Tika+Boilerpipe to get (=
hopefully) the main content as clean text.

Finally, you'd have to decide h=
ow much to leverage any reported language data you get back from either the=
 HTTP response headers or lang attributes in the HTML. Often they lie :)

-=
- Ken

> From: noname_cadhry@... [archive-crawler]
> Sent: October 3,=
 2015 1:41:09pm PDT
> To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [archi=
ve-crawler] Language Identifiers to use with Heritrix
> 
> Hi All,
> 
> 
> =
I am using Heritrix for crawling as many Arabic webpages on the web as poss=
ible. I am looking into using a language identifier / Language guesser for =
this. How do i go about this? Is there some prerequiste to it? Like can i u=
se  java plugin? Can I use my own tools and build on top of heritrix? Are t=
here any good language identifiers for heritrix? Can someone direct me on t=
his, I'm new with this.
> 
> 
> Thanks in Advance
> Fellow Heritrix user
> =

> 

--------------------------
Ken Krugler
+1 530-210-6378
